Posts.EditableText: Good News everyone...Dr.Froth is not going to have to go to jail for the next six months so now I can finish my game. Mabey with luck I will be done within six months.

Posts.EditableText: Oh God and Baby Jesus...I did not spell that word right. I am so full of remorse...sorry guys. Anyway...I was in contempt of court for not paying some fees in full and if I did not pay them in full than I was going to have to go to jail for six months. But I paid them the day before the hearing and now it is all good. Yahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh!!!! So everyone stay moist and drink deeply from the river of frothy goodness.

Posts.EditableText:
Contempt of court?
That's usually when you piss the judge off!
Posts.HTML:
Contempt of court?

Posts.EditableText: That is true, pissing the judge off can indeed result in finding yourself in contempt.  You can also be in contempt for not following a court ordered action...like I was.  But it does not matter now.  I kan miss spil al the wurdz i wan2.
